Digital Assets is a utility to follow cryptocurrencies prices, statistics and informations, and integrates well with the GNOME desktop.
Utility
https://gitlab.gnome.org/fgrabenstaetter/digital-assets/raw/master/screenshot.png
Digital Assets 1.0.0 brings the basic features to track your favorite cryptocurrencies market informations.
Price, variation, volume, rank, market cap
Circulating and max supply, ATH
Price graphics (day, month, year, all-time)
Sort cryptocurrencies and make them favorites
Choose a base currency
Support of the most popular cryptocurrencies
​
